name: C Programming Fundamentals
details: Start your programming journey with C. Learn syntax, variables, loops, and basic data structures in this foundational course.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Explore the fascinating world of algorithms. Dive into sorting, searching, and algorithm analysis with real-world applications.

name: Learn C++ for DSA
details: Unlock the power of C++ for Data Structures and Algorithms. Master classes, templates, pointers, and efficient coding.

name: Basic Data Structures
details: Build a solid foundation in data structures: arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues. Solve real-world problems with confidence.

name: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Discover the elegance of Object-Oriented Programming in Python. Explore classes, inheritance, polymorphism, and practical applications.

name: Software Engineering
details: Take a deep dive into software engineering. Learn development processes, project management, and best practices for successful projects.

name: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Become a cloud computing expert with AWS. Deploy, manage, and scale applications in the cloud, and boost your career.

name: Explore Databases (MySQL)
details: Master MySQL database management. Learn to create, query, and optimize databases, and handle data like a pro.

name: Art of Problem-Solving
details: Sharpen your problem-solving skills. Conquer algorithmic challenges, coding puzzles, and boost your coding confidence.
